mapper.insert: INSERT INTO user_record (user_id,my_team_id,user_name,user_phone, user_birthday,user_address,user_sex, user_status,role_id,user_create_date, user_card_front,user_card_back,user_card_hand) VALUES (#{userId},#{myTeamId},#{userName},#{userPhone}, #{userBirthday},#{userAddress},#{userSex}, #{userStatus},#{roleId},#{userCreateDate}, #{userCardFront},#{userCardBack},#{userCardHand})

INSERT INTO customer (customer_id, user_id, promoter_id, my_team_id, business_address, station, credit_rating,customer_type) VALUES (#{customerId},#{userId},#{promoterId}, #{myTeamId},#{businessAddress},#{station}, #{creditRating},#{customerType})
mapper.update:
UPDATE user_record
user_name = #{userName},
user_phone = #{userPhone},
user_sex = #{userSex},
user_birthday = #{userBirthday},
user_address = #{userAddress},
had_account = #{hadAccount},
WHERE user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM customer WHERE customer_id = #{customerId})

UPDATE user
user_name = #{userName},
user_phone = #{userPhone},
user_sex = #{userSex},
user_birthday = #{userBirthday},
user_address = #{userAddress},
WHERE user_id = (SELECT user_id FROM customer WHERE customer_id = #{customerId})

UPDATE customer
promoter_id = #{promoterId},
business_address = #{businessAddress},
station = #{station},
credit_rating = #{creditRating},
update_date = now(), update_count = update_count + 1,
WHERE customer_id = #{customerId}
mapper.select: SELECT c.customer_id,c.customer_type,c.had_account, c.credit_rating,c.business_address,c.station, c.update_count,c.update_date, u.user_name,u.user_phone,u.user_birthday, u.user_address,u.user_sex,u.user_create_date, u.user_card_front,u.user_card_back,u.user_card_hand FROM customer c INNER JOIN user_view u ON u.user_id = c.user_id WHERE c.customer_id = #{customerId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO customer_repertory (customer_type, my_team_id, repertory_type) VALUES (#{customerType},#{myTeamId},#{repertoryType})
mapper.select: SELECT u.user_id,u.user_name FROM user u WHERE u.my_team_id = #{myTeamId} AND u.team_department_id NOT IN (SELECT qb.department_id FROM qm_branch qb WHERE qb.my_team_id = #{myTeamId})
SELECT u.user_id,u.user_name, qb.branch_name FROM user u INNER JOIN qm_branch qb ON qb.department_id = u.team_department_id WHERE u.my_team_id = #{myTeamId}

SELECT user_id,user_name FROM (SELECT u.user_id,u.user_name FROM user u INNER JOIN department_position dp ON dp.team_department_id = u.team_department_id INNER JOIN position_permission_re ppr ON ppr.position_id = dp.position_id WHERE ppr.qm_permission_id = #{permissionId} AND u.my_team_id = #{myTeamId} UNION SELECT u.user_id,u.user_name FROM user u INNER JOIN user_qm_permission_re uqpr ON uqpr.user_id = u.user_id WHERE uqpr.qm_permission_id = #{permissionId} AND u.my_team_id = #{myTeamId} ) t1 GROUP BY user_id
